articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: Paulo Bernardo is entitled to negotiate as good a deal as possible and if Celtic have put an offer before him, he will know there is no need to rush things. articles.description: CELTIC’S legendary skipper Scott Brown celebrates his 39th birthday today. Fans’ favourite Broony left Parkhead in the summer of 2021 following the [...]

articles.description: CELTIC History Bhoy Neil Lennon celebrates his 53rd birthday today. Lennon achieved the feat after being brought to Parkhead by Martin O’Neill in December 2000 in a £6million switch [...]
